analysis.description:
Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/25/0x4eb3ce14fda3a874ecad0e9ad988258c827bae82.sol#79-85:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0x4eb3ce14fda3a874ecad0e9ad988258c827bae82.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb3ce14fda3a874ecad0e9ad988258c827bae82.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_addr' of DepositBank.WithdrawToSponsor (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb3ce14fda3a874ecad0e9ad988258c827bae82.sol#216) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_wei' of DepositBank.WithdrawToSponsor (/unique_chucks/25/0x4eb3ce14fda3a874ecad0e9ad988258c827bae82.sol#216) is not in mixedCase
